title: Students are being watched. Closely.
description:
As mass shootings at US schools increase in frequency, school administrators across the US are turning to artificially intelligent surveillance tools in an attempt to beef up school safety.

Featured Guests
@rebeccaheilweil

LINKS:
New surveillance AI can tell schools where students are and where they’ve been

Barbara Fedders’ paper on surveillance tools in North Carolina schools.

To hear more about Kai Koerber’s work on mental health access, listen to his conversation with Berkeley News. 

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset
